data.title: Robbie Williams joins Creamfields 2024 line-up
data.meta_description: Former Take That star's new dance project will take to the Creamfields stage
data.text:
Former Take That star's new dance project will take to the Creamfields stage

Robbie Williams has joined the Creamfields 2024 line-up with Flynn Francis and Tim Metcalfe as part of Lufthaus.

The pop star started the Lufthaus trio in the pandemic thanks to the former Take That star's love of clubbing away from the limelight. They went on to release a debut album, Visions Volume 1.

‌

Now Lufthaus will make their UK debut at Creamfields and will take over the Arc stage for a sunset performance on Sunday, August 25.

READ MORE: Glastonbury teases more 2024 acts as fans slam 'worst line-up ever'

READ MORE: Creamfields was the first festival I ever went to, now I'm going to be performing there

‌

Liverpool Echo Icon

Sign up to FREE email alerts from ECHO Daily News

We use your sign-up to provide content in ways you’ve consented to and improve our understanding of you. This may include adverts from us and third parties based on our knowledge of you. More info

A statement from Lufthaus said: "We’re excited for our UK debut at Creamfields, a legendary festival we’ve heard so much about, and we’re now going to get to experience the buzz and energy of the Creamfields crowd."

Lufthaus are the latest new addition to the already stacked bill which features performances from some of the world’s biggest dance acts, with over three hundred artists performing across 10 stages and over 80,000 music fans making the annual pilgrimage for one of the biggest weekends in the festival calendar.

‌

Other acts include Calvin Harris, Chase & Status LIVE, Tiësto, Michael Bibi, Steve Angello B2B Secret Special Guest, Alesso, Hardwell, Bicep present CHROMA, Eric Prydz, Martin Garrix, Camelphat, Armin van Buuren, Solomun B2B Patrick Topping, MK, Jamie Jones, Charlotte De Witte, Andy C, Peggy Gou, Fisher, Fatboy Slim, Ben Hemsley, Example, Pawsa, Scooter, Solardo, Timmy Trumpet, Pete Tong, John Summit, Low Steppa, Layla Benitez, Ben Nicky, Will Sparks, Dimitri Vegas & Like Mike, Hannah Laing. Chris Stussy, Artbat, Barry Can’t Swim, Sub Focus, Third Party, Kings of the Rollers, Darren Styles, Gorgon City, Girls Don’t Sync, blk, Franky Wah, Sarah Story, Mochakk, Belters Only and many more.

Fans can sign up now for limited resale tickets which go live at 9am on Thursday, March 28 www.creamfields.com/signup
